languages.text: "У него три лика. Нелюди-{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} желают нам гибели просто потому, что они — иные. Жалкие недолюди-мутанты — выродки, желающие нам гибели, потому что завидуют нам и стыдятся себя. И царящий в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериуме{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архивраг{/g}, желающий нам гибели просто по природе своей".

traits.locale_text: "У него три лика. Нелюди-ксеносы желают нам гибели просто потому, что они — иные. Жалкие недолюди-мутанты — выродки, желающие нам гибели, потому что завидуют нам и стыдятся себя. И Архивраг — царящий в Имматериуме Хаос, желающий нам гибели просто по природе своей".

languages.text: "It has three faces. The inhuman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} that reigns in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."
languages.original_text: "У него три лика. Нелюди-{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносы{/g} желают нам гибели просто потому, что они — иные. Жалкие недолюди-мутанты — выродки, желающие нам гибели, потому что завидуют нам и стыдятся себя. И царящий в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Имматериуме{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архивраг{/g}, желающий нам гибели просто по природе своей".

traits.locale_text: "It has three faces. The inhuman xenos, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the Archenemy — the Chaos that reigns in the Immaterium, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

"It has three faces. The inhuman xenos, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the Archenemy — the Chaos that reigns in the Immaterium, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

"It has three faces. The inhuman xenos, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the Archenemy — the Chaos that reigns in the Immaterium, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

"It has three faces. The inhuman xenos, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the Archenemy — the Chaos that reigns in the Immaterium, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

"It has three faces. The inhuman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} that reigns in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

languages.text: “帝国的敌人有三张面孔。其中包括非人的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，他们希望我们灭亡，只因为我们与他们不同；包括可悲的亚人类与变种人，这些怪物希望我们灭亡，因为他们自惭形秽，嫉妒我们；还包括统治{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}，它希望我们灭亡，因为它的本质如此。”
languages.original_text: "It has three faces. The inhuman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} that reigns in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

traits.locale_text: “帝国的敌人有三张面孔。其中包括非人的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}，他们希望我们灭亡，只因为我们与他们不同；包括可悲的亚人类与变种人，这些怪物希望我们灭亡，因为他们自惭形秽，嫉妒我们；还包括{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}，也就是统治{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的混沌，它希望我们灭亡，因为它的本质如此。”

languages.text: «Tiene tres caras: los inhumanos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, que desean nuestra muerte por el mero hecho de ser distintos a nosotros; los mutantes infrahumanos, abominaciones que desean nuestra muerte porque nos envidian y se avergüenzan de sí mismos, y el {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, que reina en el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}, que desea nuestra muerte por su propia naturaleza».
languages.original_text: "It has three faces. The inhuman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} that reigns in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene tres caras: los inhumanos {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, que desean nuestra muerte por el mero hecho de ser distintos a nosotros; los mutantes infrahumanos, abominaciones que desean nuestra muerte porque nos envidian y se avergüenzan de sí mismos, y el {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, el Caos que reina en el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Inmaterio{/g}, que desea nuestra muerte por su propia naturaleza».

languages.text: 「敵は3つの面を持ちます。異なる生命体というだけで我々を抹殺しようとする、人間ならざる{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}。我々を妬み、自分たちを恥じているからこそ我々の死を望む、忌まわしくも哀れな人間以下の変異体。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}を支配し、本質的に我々の死を求める{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}なのです」
languages.original_text: "It has three faces. The inhuman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} that reigns in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

traits.locale_text: 「敵は3つの面を持ちます。異なる生命体というだけで我々を抹殺しようとする、人間ならざる{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}。我々を妬み、自分たちを恥じているからこそ我々の死を望む、忌まわしくも哀れな人間以下の変異体。そして、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}非物質世界{/g}を支配し、本質的に我々の死を求める{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}なのです」

languages.text: "Der Feind hat drei Gesichter. Die unmenschlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, die uns den Tod wünschen, nur weil sie anders sind als wir. Die erbärmlichen untermenschlichen Mutanten – Abscheulichkeiten, die uns den Tod wünschen, weil sie uns beneiden und sich ihrer selbst schämen. Und der {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g}, der im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} herrscht und uns den Tod wünscht, weil es in seiner Natur liegt."
languages.original_text: "It has three faces. The inhuman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} that reigns in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

traits.locale_text: "Der Feind hat drei Gesichter. Die unmenschlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}, die uns den Tod wünschen, nur weil sie anders sind als wir. Die erbärmlichen untermenschlichen Mutanten – Abscheulichkeiten, die uns den Tod wünschen, weil sie uns beneiden und sich ihrer selbst schämen. Und der {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} – das Chaos, das im {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} regiert und uns den Tod wünscht, weil es in seiner Natur liegt."

languages.text: « Notre adversaire a trois visages. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} non-humains, qui désirent notre mort simplement parce que nous sommes différents. Les pitoyables mutants, des sous-hommes, des abominations qui désirent notre mort parce qu'ils nous envient et ont honte d'eux-mêmes. Et notre {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, qui règne dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} et désire notre mort de par sa nature. »
languages.original_text: "It has three faces. The inhuman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} that reigns in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

traits.locale_text: « Notre adversaire a trois visages. Les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} inhumains, qui désirent notre mort simplement parce que nous sommes différents. Les pitoyables mutants, des sous-hommes, des abominations qui désirent notre mort parce qu'ils nous envient et ont honte d'eux-mêmes. Et notre {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, le Chaos qui règne dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g} et désire notre mort de par sa nature. »

languages.text: "Üç suretleri vardır. İnsaniyetsiz {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g}... Sırf bizden farklı oldukları için ölmemizi dilerler. İnsan mertebesinin altında kalan zavallı mutantlar... O garabetler, bizi kıskandıkları ve kendilerinden utandıkları için ölmemizi ister. Bir de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar'da{/g} hüküm süren {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}... Doğası gereği ölmemizi arzular."
languages.original_text: "It has three faces. The inhuman {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}, who wish death upon us simply because they are unlike us. The pitiful subhuman mutants — abominations that wish death upon us because they envy us and are ashamed of themselves. And the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g} that reigns in the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Immaterium{/g}, which wishes death upon us by its very nature."

traits.locale_text: "Üç suretleri vardır. İnsan olmayanlar, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g}lar. Sırf bizden farklı oldukları için ölmemizi dilerler. İnsan mertebesinin altında kalmış zavallı mutantlar. Bizi kıskandıkları ve kendilerinden utandıkları için ölmemizi dileyen mide bulandırıcı şeyler. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Tindiyar{/g}'da hüküm süren {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g} ve de. Doğasından kaynaklı olarak ölmemizi diler."
